caption.p: Cross-section backscattered electron images of ( A) HKUST-1– and ( B) ZIF-67–alginate composites and their corresponding EDX elemental maps (scale bar of 60 μm). ( C) Chemical composition of sodium alginate, HKUST-1, and ZIF-67. Schematic of the formation of ( D) the HKUST-1–alginate composite, ( E) the ZIF-67–alginate composite, and ( F) the “egg-box” model of metal ion cross-linked alginate [ 159]. Reprinted with permission from Ref. [ 159]. Copyright American Chemical Society, 2016.
